titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I finished the sermon for the special service at Leominster next Sunday, & then I had an interview with M

Wright, the Secretary of the Diocesan Finance Board; I promised to subscribe Â£200 per annum. After lunch I attended Committee meetings of the Diocesan Church Bldg Society, and the Diocesan Mission Society. Then I went to the Palace, & spent nearly two hours with Norcock in the effort to arrange my books.
